name: The Walking Dead: Season 2 - Ep.1, All That Remains
name_original: The Walking Dead: Season 2 - Ep.1, All That Remains
description:
Download Episode One of The Walking Dead: Season Two, a five-part game series that continues the story of Clementine, a young girl orphaned by the undead apocalypse. Left to fend for herself, she has been forced to learn how to survive in a world gone mad.

Many months have passed since the events seen in Season One of The Walking Dead, and Clementine is searching for safety. But what can an ordinary child do to stay alive when the living can be just as bad – and sometimes worse – than the dead?

As Clementine, you will be tested by situations and dilemmas that will test your morals and your instinct for survival. Your decisions and actions will change the story around you, in this sequel to 2012’s Game of the Year.

• Decisions you made in Season One and in 400 Days will affect your story in Season Two

• Play as Clementine, an orphaned girl forced to grow up fast by the world around her

• Enjoy combined touch and console controls created specifically for the PlayStation®Vita system

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.

1 player(s)
12228KB Minimum
Touchscreen

This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®Vita systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.
